note.p: Scottish-born wool merchant. Lived in Australia for some time; settled in Chislehurst, Kent, at Bullers Wood, 1872.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office (RG 11/854/69/14), 1891 (RG 12/630/125/4)
Scotland, national probate index (calendar of confirmations and inventories), 1876–1936 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 July 2019)
Scotland, select births and baptisms, 1564–1950 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 July 2019)
